content.en: Underwater AI: Scientists are exploring the use of deep learning algorithms to address various challenges in underwater environments. These algorithms, based on convolutional neural networks, are being used for tasks such as fish species classification, identification of coral reef fishes, automatic fish detection, and fish size monitoring. By integrating computer vision and machine learning techniques, researchers aim to improve the efficiency and accuracy of underwater visual analysis, stock assessment, and fisheries resource monitoring.
content.da: Undervands-AI: Forskere undersøger brugen af dyb læring-algoritmer til at tackle forskellige udfordringer i undervandsmiljøer. Disse algoritmer, baseret på convolutional neural networks, bruges til opgaver som klassifikation af fiskearter, identifikation af koralrevsfisk, automatisk fiskedetektering og overvågning af fiskestørrelse. Ved at integrere computer vision og maskinlæringsteknikker stræber forskerne efter at forbedre effektiviteten og præcisionen af ​​undervandsvisualanalyse, bestandsvurdering og overvågning af fiskeressourcer.
